posts.post_title: FS: NEW Lot of 11 Nicer Low Grade T206 **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Bescher (trimmed on bottom) - $18
Campbell - $25 **SOLD**
Conroy - $40 **SOLD**
Cravath - $20
Elberfeld (Topps T206 buyback) - $35

Randall - $25 **SOLD**

Tannehill (miscut/trimmed-no name on bottom) - $18
Weimer - $30 **SOLD**
Price drop on the last few cards available.  Thanks for looking!
